channel.title: Does the CAN transciever get power from Electron battery pack
channel.description: I'm not an electronics expert, sorry for what might be a simple question. If I plug an Electron into the Carloop, and the Electron has the battery pack attached providing the only source of power, will the CAN transceiver on the Carloop receive power?

item.title: Does the CAN transciever get power from Electron battery pack
item.dc:creator: cyclin_al1
item.description:
The Electron battery supplies only the Electron.
It does not back-feed power to the Carloop circuit board.
Carloop’s power supply takes it source from the OBD connector.

See the response to your other post here:
https://carloop.dyndns.org/t/carloop-problems-with-24v-input/278/8

Read full topic
item.source: Does the CAN transciever get power from Electron battery pack
